name: Chicken Teriyaki
description: Sweet and savory glazed chicken with Japanese flavors

instructions.description: Combine soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar in bowl
Mince garlic and ginger, add to sauce
Heat oil in pan over medium-high heat
Cook chicken skin-side down until golden
Flip chicken and cook other side
Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken, simmer until glazed

advance_prep: Marinate chicken in teriyaki sauce for 1 hour
